about_the_game:
Anthill Village is a cosy, creative strategy game where you build villages for thousands of ant-inspired creatures.

Village Building with a Twist!

Antlings have all the strengths of both ants and people! They can craft tools and build villages - while also cooperating on a massive scale thanks to their hive-mind intelligence.

  • A unique blend of village-building and tactical gameplay.

  • Scour the land, using all resources you can find to further the colony.

  • Evolve your ants down many different paths to suit a range of different habitats.

  • Fend off predatory animals - until you can become the apex predator yourself!

Open Development

Check out the YouTube channel or Discord server to follow along with development.
